outputs.output_descr: Establish the modern equiped Vocational Training Center in Deir Ezzor in cooperation with Ministry of Industry to include proffesions needed in the area in rsponse to the assessment of the market needs there and provide training of trainers

to improve business capacities of existing enterprises and allow well-trained, viable MSMEs to pursue their activities after graduation from the center, thus generating sustainable employment opportunities and business activity.

Rehabilitating ancient Roman Wells in the north eastern region, the poorest regions of the country, for use as a sustainable water source and safe drinking water by the local population, without incurring environmental damages.

project_descr: Support for Bus. Innovation and Development Center in Der Ezzor
project_title: Support for Bus. Innovation and Dev. Center in Der Ezzor
